title: CVS Posts Higher Revenue, Boosted by Covid-19 Vaccine Demand
sub_head: Drugstore chain administered more than 20 million Covid-19 vaccines in latest quarter
body:
CVS Health Corp. posted higher revenue in the holiday quarter, lifted by the more than 20 million Covid-19 vaccines it administered in the period.
With a boost from the vaccinations and the over 8 million Covid-19 tests CVS administered in the quarter, same-store sales grew by 13.4% from a year earlier, when the vaccines were just being authorized.
